Question: Guangzhou Asensing Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Asensing Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: High-Precision Positioning Solutions

- Exhibited high-precision positioning products and LiDAR sensor at CES 2024
- Launched the A2 LiDAR sensor for ADAS & autonomous driving, robotics, and machinery
- Showcased Integrated Navigation System (P-Box), Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU), and High-Precision GNSS Positioning Module at CES 2024
- New products support PPP-RTK for international models and meet ASIL-D safety requirements
- P-BOX system designed for autonomous driving above L2 level, achieving lane-level navigation with high accuracy
- Mass-produced high-performance integrated navigation system P-BOX meets functional safety requirements and has been incorporated into over 150,000 mass-produced L2+ autonomous driving vehicles
- Continues research and development of high-precision positioning technology for autonomous vehicles, aiming to enhance safety, reliability, and accuracy.
Summary_cn:
广州Asensing科技有限公司。

产品：高精度定位解决方案

- 在CES 2024展出了高精度定位产品和LiDAR传感器
- 推出了适用于ADAS和自动驾驶、机器人和机械领域的A2 LiDAR传感器
- 在CES 2024展示了集成导航系统（P-Box）、惯性测量单元（IMU）和高精度GNSS定位模块
- 新产品支持国际型号的PPP-RTK，并符合ASIL-D安全要求
- P-BOX系统专为L2级以上的自动驾驶设计，实现了高精度的车道级导航
- 大规模生产的高性能集成导航系统P-BOX符合功能安全要求，已纳入15万辆以上大规模生产的L2+自动驾驶车辆中
- 不断研发高精度定位技术，以提升自动驾驶车辆的安全性、可靠性和精度。
